segments.text: I can't believe how much water is pouring out of that sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman seems completely oblivious to it all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a bit angry seeing the children taking cookies without asking.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is going to fall off that stool if he's not careful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the girl is eagerly waiting for her share of the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's amazing how the woman doesn't hear the water splashing on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the dish towel in her hands is distracting her from everything else.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so peaceful compared to the chaos in here.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope someone cleans up that water soon before someone slips.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a bit disgusting to see the water spreading all over the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR
